questions.quote: So we started drinking, and I'll tell you I don't know if it was the alcohol or the ammonia, but the next think I knew she was mopping the floor with me.
Wait, you, you mean to tell me you don't have a ticket for the coat?
My friends, a toast. As the wolly-haired Melanasians of Papua, New Guinea once said,  All right! Who's dancing?  No one? Alright, I'll just have to get things started.
Well, apparently you have a tremendous influence over this woman: anything you say she does!
Where did I get the coffee? Where do think I got the coffee, at the grocery store.
You know what drove me crazy about him? Did you ever notice that he stood too close to you when he talked?
Hmm ah. I'm not going through this every week, I tell you that right now. And what are these? Plums? What is that?
So, if Susan and I had... I mean, if the envelopes hadn't, uh... then we--
I've been trying to leave this group for 10 years. Vaya con dios.
Because I had a bad experience with a hair when I was younger.
